allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix\(nav\): resolve dropdown bugs on desktop and mobile

- Fix caret hidden by display:none !important conflict \(add display:block !important override\)
- Remove duplicate conflicting caret definitions \(CSS border-triangle vs Unicode glyph\)
- Remove conflicting dropdown animation \(max-height:0 overriding opacity/transform\)
- Move desktop hover styles out of mobile-only media query \(nested min-width:1024 inside max-width:1023 never matched\)
- Add is-hoverable to Test Menu dropdown for desktop hover-to-open
- Remove debug outlines

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix\(nav\): mobile drawer expansion, invisible text, and desktop green flash

- Mobile drawer: pointer-events:none when closed, auto when open \(prevents
  off-screen drawer from intercepting taps near the burger button\)
- Mobile dropdown: max-height:0 + overflow:hidden by default to prevent
  Bulma''s is-hoverable from expanding dropdowns on page load
- Dropdown text: add !important to dark color \(#222/#4a4a4a\) so main.php''s
  blanket white navbar-item color doesn''t make text invisible on white bg
- Desktop: override Bulma''s :focus/:active green \(#00b89c\) on navbar-link
  buttons, not just :hover and .is-active

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
